dct_description_sm: by Keith Johnston ; engraved & printed by W. & A.K. Johnston.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Geographical & Italian miles", "Roman miles", and "English statute miles".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text: Note on the spelling of Arabic names in the Holy Land...
"30" -- bottom right corner. "Keith Johnston's General atlas" -- top right corner.
From W. & A.K. Johnston's General atlas. Edinburgh : Johnston, 1862. Map no. 30.
